text:
Our application can insert/delete records. In order to simulate concurrent 
users doing this operation we need a unique record name. We have modified 
JMeter to search for something like ${thread#} in a request argument and 
substitue it with the thread number. This now allows our n-concurrent users to 
create individual records and search for it to delete it.

I'd be happy to contribute the code if you think this is a valuable feature.

JJ-
